title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.5 - Dot procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.5 - Dot procedures

State Regulations

The anti-drug and alcohol programs required by this Part
must be conducted according to the requirements of this Part and the DOT
procedures. Terms and concepts used in this Part have the same meaning as in
the DOT procedures. Violations of DOT procedures with respect to anti-drug and
alcohol programs required by this Part are violations of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
262.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
